description: Detects creation of local users via the net.exe command with the option "never expire"
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: New User Created Via Net.EXE With Never Expire Option
query: (((process.executable.text:("*\\net.exe" OR "*\\net1.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("net.exe" OR "net1.exe"))) AND (process.command_line.text:"*user*" AND process.command_line.text:"*add*" AND process.command_line.text:"*expires\:never*"))
